# Figures

This folder contains visualization outputs from model experiments.

---

## Expected Outputs

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `model_evaluation.png` | RMSE, RÂ² comparison charts |
| `feature_importance.png` | Feature importance plots |
| `cyclical_encoding.png` | Cyclical feature visualization |
